mapper.select: SELECT SCODE,ENTRYNUM,TITLE,WRITER,REGISTRATIONDATE,VIEWCOUNT,CONTENT,IMGPATH FROM STATION_BOARD WHERE SCODE=#{scode} AND ENTRYNUM=#{entryNum}
SELECT SCODE,ENTRYNUM,TITLE,WRITER,REGISTRATIONDATE,VIEWCOUNT,CONTENT,IMGPATH FROM STATION_BOARD WHERE SCODE=#{scode} ORDER BY ENTRYNUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STATION_BOARD WHERE SCODE=#{scode}

SELECT SCODE,ENTRYNUM,TITLE,WRITER,REGISTRATIONDATE,VIEWCOUNT,CONTENT,IMGPATH FROM (SELECT SCODE,ENTRYNUM,TITLE,WRITER,REGISTRATIONDATE,VIEWCOUNT,CONTENT,IMGPATH FROM STATION_BOARD WHERE SCODE=#{scode} ORDER BY ENTRYNUM DESC) BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT SCODE,ENTRYNUM,TITLE,WRITER,REGISTRATIONDATE,VIEWCOUNT,CONTENT,IMGPATH FROM STATION_BOARD WHERE SCODE=#{scode} ORDER BY ENTRYNUM DESC) BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
